thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Northisle Forms Joint Venture With Freeport-Mcmoran Mineral Properties Canada

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Northisle Forms Joint Venture With Freeport-Mcmoran Mineral Properties Canada

organizations.name: reuters) - northisle copper and gold inc

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Northisle Copper And Gold Inc:
* NORTHISLE FORMS A JOINT VENTURE WITH FREEPORT-MCMORAN MINERAL PROPERTIES CANADA INC ON ITS PEMBERTON HILLS COPPER PROPERTY
* NORTHISLE COPPER AND GOLD - ‍UNDER JV TERMS, FREEPORT MAY EARN UP TO 65% INTEREST IN PEMBERTON PROPERTY BY FUNDING CAD24 MILLION EXPLORATION EXPENDITURES​
* NORTHISLE COPPER AND GOLD - UPON COMPLETION OF FIRST OPTION, A JOINT VENTURE CO TO BE FORMED TO OPERATE PROPERTY UNDER SHAREHOLDER‘S AGREEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
